Type Permanent Advertiser Infotek Consulting Services (Company) Contact Infotek Consulting Services Ref JS4459934 Date 22/06/2009 04:51:22 Apply Now Add To Basket
Storage Engineer/Implementation Specialists Needed Immediately X3 Toronto, Ontario, CA 120k-160k; 2 Weeks Paid Vacation Time
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We are seeking 3 experienced Storage Specialists to work for our client in the Toronto area in their professional services division. Responsible for leading customers through the deployment of HDS storage solutions, with specific emphasis on migrating customer data and Servers onto HDS storage platforms. Excellent opportunity to work with newest technologies in storage virtualization and "green - environmentally friendly" technologies. Required skills: 5+ years of experience working with Storage Management Software and Hardware in high capacity/high availability environments with one or more of the following configurations: HDS USP HP-XP Series Sun StorEdge Strong technical background in the areas of data storage and replication Knowledge of Server replication products (RoboCopy, StorageX, SecureCopy, mirroring, etc) Enterprise storage management Solid operating systems skills with storage configuration (volume management) Strong customer service mentality These are 12 month renewable contracts paying $120,000 to $160,000+ annual salary plus 2 weeks paid vacation each year. Typical work week is 40-50 hours per week. Extensive Travel within GTA & Ontario with some travel outside Ontario as needed. Travel expenses reimbursed Required Skills: Please see above For more experienced, expert types with 10 plus years storage experience - compensation commensurate with experience. [view full job]
